Articles.Content:
I decided to rebuild my rockets for 1.3.1 and was wondering whats the correct trajectory on the accent and burn back for a reusable. Searching around I can't seem to find any definitive answer on which is the best, the KoS rockets I've tired do it in different ways. Currently I use a 45 degree end turn and an 80% turn shape in mechjeb for my accent. Then I usually burn retrograde for a bit and then point towards the horizon to get the booster back to KSC. My booster continues up and then comes down. I also use a locked fuel tank on the bottom for my burn back fuel so my accent might not be exactly how Mechjeb plans it. 

Thanks!

Hey check out my vid. Might help.

 

 

Also this vid I actually re-use the booster.
Your video is where I learned how to do it in the first place. Great video, I will pay more attention to it.
